notes: This set of parameters is used to support NorESM calibration efforts on no-comp configurations. The set generated through this patch file is not complete and should not be considered a release type parameterization
usage: This file should be passed as input to the batch patch python script in fates, from the parameter_files directory:, like so: (cd parameter_files;python tools/batch_patch_params.py --fin patch_nocomp_noresm.json)
